Member Function Documentation

◆ Update()

void India::ActiveSceneSystem::Update ( UpdateParameters &  params)
overridevirtualnoexcept

Calls scenemanager to returns vector with scenes that have an ActiveSceneComponent. Loops through the provided vector, checks if the scene is permitted to be actived. Call SceneManager->SetActiveScene to toggle objects active.

Implements India::System.
